agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Commerce TIME & DATE: 8:30 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Kelly Hancock The Senate Committee on Business and Commerce will consider and adopt the Committee rules, and conduct any other organizational business deemed necessary by the Chair. The Committee will also take up and consider the following: SB 59 Zaffirini Relating to certain images captured by an unmanned aircraft. SB 361 Huffman Relating to certain contracts for the transfer of a pet. SB 401 Hancock | et al. Relating to legislative oversight of deferred maintenance projects. SB 476 Hancock | et al. Relating to requirements for and municipal regulation of dogs in an outdoor dining area of a food service establishment. Public testimony will be limited to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 20 copies to the committee clerk with your name and bill number on each copy. Please register for this hearing using the Senate kiosk located in the extension hallways or by going to http://swrs.
